summary: This is an email from an FBI Victim Services Division Program Manager to ODAG (Office of the Deputy Attorney General) regarding logistical preparations for a victim briefing related to the Epstein case. It discusses agenda items including victim packets, RSVPs, and travel arrangements for a meeting on November 11, 2020.

persons.name: Program Manager FBI Victim Services Division

events.title: Epstein Victim Briefing/Meeting
events.description: A scheduled meeting or briefing for victims, requiring logistical coordination for travel and access to the Miami Field Office.
personsInvolved: Program Manager FBI Victim Services Division

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was coordinating a victim briefing related to the Epstein case with the Office of the Deputy Attorney General in late 2020.
Logistical details included preparing victim packets with resources, reimbursement forms, and an executive summary, and managing travel and RSVPs.
A specific meeting was scheduled for November 11, 2020, requiring potential access to the FBI's Miami Field Office.
